FuncDef: This command creates a match context for this entry. Theprotocolvalue specifies which Layer-4 protocol the packet should match.
CLIs: match protocol { any | icmp | tcp | upd | gre }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the only supported match context is protocol.
Specifies to match ICMP packets in a v4 filter.
Specifies to match GRE over IP packets.
